quotes.quote: A man's homeland is wherever he prospers.
quotes.author: Aristophanes

quotes.quote: Not going home is already like death.
quotes.author: E. Catherine Tobler

quotes.quote: Luxuries are never so comfortable as are the familiar, ordinary things of home.
quotes.author: George Moore

quotes.quote: A man travels the world over in search of what he needs and returns home to find it.
quotes.author: Harold B. Lee

quotes.quote: The most important work you and I will ever do will be within the walls of our own homes.
quotes.author: Herman Melville

quotes.quote: Life's a voyage that's homeward bound.
quotes.author: John Howard Payne

quotes.quote:
Mid pleasures and palaces though we may roam,
Be it ever so humble, there's no place like home.
quotes.author: Joyce Maynard

quotes.quote: A good home must be made, not bought.
quotes.author: Lois McMaster Bujold

quotes.quote: My home is not a place, it is people.
quotes.author: May Sarton

quotes.quote: A house that does not have one worn, comfy chair in it is soulless.
